Who Am I?

My name is David Ojesekhoba. I am currently a first-year student in my second semester of Computer Systems Technology: Software Development and Network Engineering program; SDNE for short. From as far back as I can remember I have always loved knowing the way things work; whether it is some sort of software—such as an app or a website—or even mechanical machines such as cars or airplanes. Because these things and what could be achieved with them were so amazing, I grew up wanting to make my own contribution to this growing pool of innovation, so here I am.

Why This Website?
